01.title: The Study of Plants
01.description: Plants are infinitely more interesting than people. There are so many varieties, and each one has unique properties. If you could do nothing but look at new plants all day, you absolutely would. But you’re running out of new plants to look at. Luckily there’s an entirely new ecosystem in the northern part of the continent.
01.requirements: Personally collect five different types of herbs through loot tokens.

02.title: Searching for the Oak
02.description: Most people believe that the Great Oak in the capitol is the true face of the divine, but you have heard rumors of a great prophet who brought a sacred acorn from the north to plant the Great Oak. The true Oak is somewhere in this frozen waste, and you wish to gaze upon it in awe.
02.requirements: Personally loot 8 total lumber cards through loot tokens to unlock Sacred Soil [scenario_69], and then follow it to a conclusion.

04.title: Greed is Good
04.description: There are many high and lofty goals in life—sick grandmas and epic love. Ridiculous. Only one thing matters and that’s money—getting the most of it and keeping it safe. The weight of gold in your purse is a greater feeling than anything else imaginable, grandmas be damned.
04.requirements: Have 80+20xL gold in your possession, where L is the prosperity level.

05.title: Build, not Destroy
05.description: Sure, you’ve made a name for yourself as a seasoned fighter. When push comes to shove, you know how to kill a man. Still, it doesn’t feel good. You long to find a new way of life. One that doesn’t involve tearing something down, but rather building something up. To use your hands for a positive purpose: that would be ideal.
05.requirements: Experience the construction of twelve different buildings or building upgrades.

06.title: Team Building
06.description: You are a people person. Sure, you’ve got a job to do, but would it hurt to make a few friends? Of course not. Nothing would make you happier than sitting around the hearth with some fast friends, drinking, talking, and playing games.
06.requirements: During eigth different outpost phases, read a person’s name in an event or section.

09.title: Life Lessons
09.description: Life is all about the experience. It is fleeting and really only meaningful on a very small scale—to you and those in your immediate surroundings. The best thing you can do with your life is to just go out and experience as much as possible. Have fun, find adventure, and maybe get a little blood on your face.

10.title: Explore the Reaches
10.description: Who are these people? They come all the way to this glorious wilderness and then huddle together in their drab, little buildings. It’s madness. You will climb the tallest peak and go farther out into the snow plains and frozen seas than anyone else has done before. You will see the glorious sights yet unseen.
10.requirements: Complete five different scenarios that require [boat], [climbinggear], or [sled].

11.title: Refined Tastes
11.description: You’ll admit, you are not used to such... rustic surroundings. But you are not one to give up. You’ll make this work. Anything can be made beautiful if you put enough effort into it. Even the crude can be refined into elegance. Yes, this whole place could use a little more... elegance.
11.requirements: Own items whose crafting costs include a total of at least fifteen items.

13.title: End the Trickery
13.description: Vile little creatures, imps desire nothing more than to sow chaos. They are demons; unnatural abominations that have caused you nothing but pain. They tricked your family out of everything they owned, including their horse, which the imps ate. You loved that horse, and you simply hate imps.

14.title: Eternal Wanderer
14.description: There is so much to see in this world. So many wondrous places beyond belief. Surely all these miraculous sights were not created by chance. You desire to visit these places and meditate upon their existence. Perhaps doing so will give greater insight into your own existence as well.
14.requirements: Complete a scenario in each of the following areas: Whitefire Wood, Copperneck Mountains, Radiant Forest, Crystal Fields, and Biting Sea.

20.title: Return to Simplicity
20.description: Mechanical creatures roaming the frozen north—and you thought you’d heard of everything! Who knows where they came from or what they’re up to, but it can’t be good, right? You prefer simplicity. Metal is used for tools, swords, and armor. Not to make strange things that move around on their own. No, these clanking things must be destroyed at all cost.
